abstract: In a bid to regain the sales lead from its rival Colgate-Palmolive, Procter & Gamble has introduced Crest Pro-Health, which claims to deliver everything a consumer could possibly want in a toothpaste.
snippet: In a bid to regain the sales lead from its rival Colgate-Palmolive, Procter & Gamble has introduced Crest Pro-Health, which claims to deliver everything a consumer could possibly want in a toothpaste.
lead_paragraph: PROCTER & GAMBLE is fighting to be tops in toothpaste again.

headline.main: In a Battle of Toothpastes, It’s Information vs. Emotion
headline.print_headline: In a Battle of Toothpastes, It’s Information vs. Emotion
